import React from 'react' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faCoffee } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import { Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; const PostItem = props => { const { title, content, author, likes, dislikes } = props return (
{title} {/* {title} */} {content}
{author}
) } export default PostItem
